description: Trailer to be delivered to CFB Trenton, Ontario with an expected delivery date of 120 days after contract award.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement: Trailer, Engagement and Attraction Team
#### Tender Reference: PW-22-01017124
#### Amendment Number: 2
#### Solicitation Number: W8476-236619/B

**Tender Information**
* **Tender Closing Date:** January 24, 2023, at 14:00:00 (Eastern Standard Time)
* **Publication Date:** December 13, 2022
* **Amendment Date:** January 10, 2023

**Project Overview**
The Department of National Defence (DND) requires a trailer for the Engagement and Attraction Team, along with associated Integrated Logistics Solution (ILS) deliverables, for delivery to CFB Trenton, Ontario.

**Key Details**
* **Delivery Date:** 120 days from contract award
* **Location of Delivery:** CFB Trenton, Ontario, Canada
* **Language of Documents:** Both English and French are acceptable
* **Security Requirements:** None
* **Trade Agreements:** This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Procurement Method**
This tender is a Request for Proposal (RFP), which is a competitive process. The solicitation is open to all qualified suppliers.

**Contact Information**
* **Name:** Genevieve Roach
* **Email:** genevieve.roach@forces.gc.ca
* **Attachments:** Please refer to the attached documents, which are available on the CanadaBuys website.

**Additional Information**
A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders/offerors/suppliers who bid on the original solicitation. The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

### Attachments
Please refer to the attachments for more detailed information:
- [Original Solicitation Document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/13/1d097888e06f780a6bc649718fd3c164/en_rfp_w8476-236619-b_original.pdf)
- [Modification 001 Document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/10/bd0ed82ea2cf07a7bbe557cf6d1a4aa1/en_rfp_w8476-236619-b_-_modification_001.pdf)

(Note: I removed the redundant information and rephrased the text to make it concise and clear) Let me know if
